   .. py:attribute:: create_test_procedure_without_params_sql
      :value: Multiline-String

      .. raw:: html

         <details><summary>Show Value</summary>

      .. code-block:: python

         """
                 CREATE PROCEDURE "TEST_PROCEDURE" AS
                     V_I INTEGER;
                 BEGIN
                     V_I := 1;
                 END;
             """

      .. raw:: html

         </details>




   .. py:attribute:: create_test_procedure_with_int_param_sql
      :value: Multiline-String

      .. raw:: html

         <details><summary>Show Value</summary>

      .. code-block:: python

         """
                 CREATE PROCEDURE "TEST_PROCEDURE" (P_I INTEGER) AS
                     V_I INTEGER;
                 BEGIN
                     V_I := P_I;
                 END;
             """

      .. raw:: html

         </details>




   .. py:attribute:: create_test_table_with_composite_primary_key
      :value: Multiline-String

      .. raw:: html

         <details><summary>Show Value</summary>

      .. code-block:: python

         """
                 CREATE TABLE test_table_composite_pk (
                     column_1 NUMBER(11) NOT NULL,
                     column_2 NUMBER(11) NOT NULL,
                     PRIMARY KEY (column_1, column_2)
                 )
             """

      .. raw:: html

         </details>
